article_title: BlueCross president: Columbus operation poised for job growth
article_text:
Pending merger between Anthem and Cigna could mean more business in Columbus

Executive Jeff Fusile pushing rollout of care system that emphasizes compensating primary-care doctors better

BlueCross BlueShield “committed” to remaining in Georgia’s health-care exchange

article_metadata.news-keywords: bluecross blueshield of georgia, anthem, blue cross blue shield, jeff fusile, unitedhealth, affordable care act, obamacare
article_metadata.description: The BlueCross BlueShield of Georgia operation in Columbus is well positioned for growth whether or not the health-care insurer’s parent firm, Anthem, completes its $54 billion mega-merger with Cigna later this year, said Jeff Fusile, president of the Georgia company.
article_metadata.title: BlueCross president: Columbus operation poised for job growth | Columbus Ledger-Enquirer
